title: Diablo 3 Logotype
content:
The new Diablo 3 logotype. I assume it's custom, but is it based on some existing face?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414063632im_/http:/typophile.com/files/diablo3_logotype_5588.jpg)
author: Jonathan Clede

comments.content:
The logotype is a special design for the product.

(Diablo) [http://www.diablo-movie.com/diablo-movie.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414063632/http:/www.diablo-movie.com/diablo-movie.jpg "http://www.diablo-movie.com/diablo-movie.jpg")  
(Diablo 2) [http://www.galeon.com/laparanoia/img/Diablo%202%20Wallpaper.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414063632/http:/www.galeon.com/laparanoia/img/Diablo%202%20Wallpaper.jpg "http://www.galeon.com/laparanoia/img/Diablo%202%20Wallpaper.jpg")

You can see here some differences between the new one and the old one. The A was flipped and they did some little changes around. You can see the changes that they made in 12 years :D Diablo II was released in 2000 and Diablo in 1996
